resources.string: Please restart the TV, to update the program will continue to restart......
The system can not detect SDCARD, have no a way to perform update operation, please insert SDCARD.
In the process of installation errors, please replace update package.
Your TVOS version has is the latest version!
Your SDCard without the latest on the image files
Please check your deposit directory whether for: /mstara3 /, filename is: update_signed. Zip
1.Press "Download" to download new FW,then press "Upgrade" to upgrade.
2.The TV will be standby mode after upgrade sucessed.
2.If the TV in standby mode,please press "CH+" to power on.
3.After upgrade,TV will in init mode ,you need set user param.
SDCARD can normal use, you can backup the current TV system, please click on start backup.
Is backup, please do not perform other operations, please wait for......
Is restoring, please do not perform other operations, please wait for......
SDCARD can normal use, you can restore the current TV system, please click beginning to recover.
No recovery files SDCARD above, unable to system recovery operation.
Complete recovery, please restart your TV
This version of the updated content as follows:
Testing to the external storage device inserted
Testing to the external storage equipment removed or abnormal
Download appear in the process of the error, please download again
Error reading files, please check whether there is versioninfor SDCARD documents
Restore the factory settings list of features (clear all user data on the TV):
Are you sure to restore the factory settings?
Your TV Cache partition did not have enough storage space, please restart your TV free memory or insert memory enough SDCard again after the operation.
Your TV SDCard did not have enough storage space, please release enough memory after the operation.
Your TV does not have enough storage space, please ensure enough memory after the operation.
The wifi no password please click on the Connect button
Input password is too short，Should be more than 5 characters.
Input password is too short，Should be more than 8 characters.
Input password is too long,Should be less than 64 characters.
Click here to select a wireless
Cable connection, please verify insert an Internet connection.
String have inserted, can undertake cable connection.
PPPOE automatic dial-up failure, please verify an insert or user name and password mistake.
Please hang up the PPPOE dial-up networking
There is no available wireless networks
Please Turn off the wireless network first
Please switch to a wireless network connection
The password should contain at least eight characters
The password should contain at least eight characters, please re-enter
The wireless device does not support this feature
Through the network to gain time and date automatically
The max date of system supporting is 2038-1-18,please input again.
Please enter the year such as: 2012

The machine is provided to the user for any application, services and content by third party service providers, and not by the Haier offers.\n Users to download, install and use any third party applications, services and content, are subject to the third party services and providers use conditions, the license agreement, privacy policy restriction and protection to the third party software Haier, safety, validity, legality, availability is not responsible for, nor assume any legal liability.
Allowed to install unknown source applications

Your system and personal data are more susceptible to from unknown sources application attack. You agree that you are due to the use of these applications and the system of damage or loss of data assume full responsibility.
This action will erase the SD card. You will lose all data on the card! This action will not delete the applications.
Formatting SD card, please wait a moment..
Forcibly closed its application can lead to abnormal, are you sure you want to do this?
The application to all of the data will be permanently delete. Delete the content including all documents, Settings, account, database, etc

"An app on your TV wants to turn on Bluetooth and make your TV discoverable by other devices. Allow?"
